questions.textKey: Air Traffic Control Services - The purpose of the issue of clearances by an Air Traffic Control Unit is to...
options: prevent collision between aircraft under its control and expediting and maintaining an orderly flow of traffic.
provide Flight Information Service and expediting and maintaining an orderly flow of traffic.
provide advisory service and expediting and maintaining an orderly flow of traffic.
questions.correctAnswer: prevent collision between aircraft under its control and expediting and maintaining an orderly flow of traffic.
